12    /**
13    * File used to control cache
14    * 
15    * This file provides functions to control the content of the cache.
16    * This file is made to make the software more maintain able, and as an interface to the cache for third party developers.
17    * 
18    * @package WikiPlot
19    * @license http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt GNU General Public License
20    * @author WikiPlot development team.
21    * @copyright Copyright 2006, WikiPlot development team.
22    */
23    
24    /**
25    * Require local settings
26    *
27    * This file is needed to control the cache correctly.
28    */
29    require_once("WikiPlotSettings.php");
30    
31    /**
32    * Cache controlling class
33    * 
34    * Class used to control the cache.
35    * 
36    * @package WikiPlot
37    * @license http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt GNU General Public License
38    * @author WikiPlot development team.
39    * @copyright Copyright 2006, WikiPlot development team.
40    */
41    class Cache
42    {
43        /**
44        *Cleanup the cache
45        *
46        *Cleans up the cache by removing old and unused files.
47        *
48        *@access public
49        *@uses CleanupMaxAge()
50        *@uses CleanupUnused()
51        */
52        function CleanupCache()
53        {
54            $this->CleanupMaxAge();
55            $this->CleanupUnused();
56        }
57    
58        /**
59        * Cleanup cache from old files
60        *
61        * Removes old files from the cache, see LocalSettings.php for settings.
62        *
63        * @access public
64        */
65        function CleanupMaxAge()
66        {
67            $CachePath = $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] . WikiPlotCachePath;
68            if ($cache = opendir($CachePath))
69            {
70                $MaxFileAge = time() - (WikiPlotCacheAge * 24 * 60 * 60);
71                while (false !== ($file = readdir($cache)))
72                {
73                    $FileAge = filemtime($CachePath . "/" . $file);
74                    if($FileAge>$MaxFileAge)
75                    {
76                        if(!(unlink($CachePath . "/" . $file)))
77                        {
78                            //TODO: throw some error!
79                        }
80                    }
81                }
82                closedir($cache);
83            }else{
84                //TODO: throw some error!
85            }
86            
87        }
88    
89        /**
90        * Cleanup unused files from cache
91        *
92        * Removes old unused files from the cache, see LocalSettings.php for settings.
93        * This functions indentifies files as unused if they havn't been accessed for a long time.
94        *
95        * @access public
96        */
97        function CleanupUnused()
98        {
99            $CachePath = $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] . WikiPlotCachePath;
100           if ($cache = opendir($CachePath))
101           {
102               $MaxFileAge = time() - (WikiPlotMaxUnusedAge * 24 * 60 * 60);
103               while (false !== ($file = readdir($cache)))
104               {
105                   $FileAge = fileatime($CachePath . "/" . $file);
106                   if($FileAge>$MaxFileAge)
107                   {
108                       if(!(unlink($CachePath . "/" . $file)))
109                       {
110                           //TODO: throw some error!
111                       }
112                   }
113               }
114               closedir($cache);
115           }else{
116               //TODO: throw some error!
117           }
118       }
119       
120       /**
121       * Does file exist in cache
122       *
123       * Returns true or false depending on whether or not FileName Exist in cache.
124       *
125       * @access public
126       * @param string $FileName Filename relative to cache.
127       * @return boolean Whether or not FileName exist.
128       */
129       function FileExist($FileName)
130       {
131           return file_exists($_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] . WikiPlotCachePath . $FileName);
132       }
133   
134       /**
135       * Get file URL
136       *
137       * Gets the URL og the given FileName, returns false if the files doen't exist.
138       * 
139       * @access public
140       * @uses FileExist()
141       * @param string $FileName Filename relative to cache.
142       * @return string Returns the URL of the file.
143       */
144       function FileURL($FileName)
145       {
146           if($this->FileExist($FileName))
147           {
148               return WikiPlotCacheURL . "/" . $FileName;
149           }else{
150               return false;
151           }
152       }
153   
154       /**
155       * Get cache Path
156       *
157       * Get absolute path to the cache, returns false if FileName exists.
158       *
159       *@access public
160       *@uses FileExist()
161       *@param string $FileName Filename you want the path to, shortcut to detecting if file exists.
162       *@return string Path to the cache, false if FileName exists.
163       */
164       function CachePath($FileName = null)
165       {
166           if(!is_null($FileName))
167           {
168               if($this->FileExist($FileName))
169               {
170                   return false;
171               }else{
172                   return $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] . WikiPlotCachePath . $FileName;
173               }
174           }else{
175               return $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] . WikiPlotCachePath;
176           }
177       }
178   }
179   
180   
181   ?>
